body:
----------

And now you know - "Q" is a demonic deception...

----------

Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils;

1 Timothy 4:1

----------

For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears; And they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.

2 Timothy 4:3-4

----------

Regard not them that have familiar spirits, neither seek after wizards, to be defiled by them: I am the LORD your God.

Leviticus 19:31

----------

And Jesus asked him, saying, What is thy name? And he said, Legion: because many devils were entered into him.

Luke 8:30

----------

And he asked him, What is thy name? And he answered, saying, My name is Legion: for we are many.

Mark 5:9

----------

In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not, lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ, who is the image of God, should shine unto them.

2 Corinthians 4:4

----------

Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:

1 Peter 5:8

----------

Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

James 4:7

----------

And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil, who are taken captive by him at his will.

2 Timothy 2:26

----------
body_html:
And now you know - "Q" is a demonic deception...

Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils;

1 Timothy 4:1

For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears; And they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.

2 Timothy 4:3-4

Regard not them that have familiar spirits, neither seek after wizards, to be defiled by them: I am the LORD your God.

Leviticus 19:31

And Jesus asked him, saying, What is thy name? And he said, Legion: because many devils were entered into him.

Luke 8:30

And he asked him, What is thy name? And he answered, saying, My name is Legion: for we are many.

Mark 5:9

In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not, lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ, who is the image of God, should shine unto them.

2 Corinthians 4:4

Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:

1 Peter 5:8

Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

James 4:7

And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil, who are taken captive by him at his will.

2 Timothy 2:26

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

body: This guy has been spamming a works gospel for the past week or 2. One time he even quoted a passage about being respectful at the lord's supper as "proof" that an improper diet will send you to hell. His standards were zero caffeine, no alcohol whatsoever (I guess Jesus is in hell then), no "unhealthy" food, etc. One time I debunked one of his works salvation posts fair and square, and instead of responding he just blocked me so I can't keep exposing his pharisaic ideas.
body_html: This guy has been spamming a works gospel for the past week or 2. One time he even quoted a passage about being respectful at the lord's supper as "proof" that an improper diet will send you to hell. His standards were zero caffeine, no alcohol whatsoever (I guess Jesus is in hell then), no "unhealthy" food, etc. One time I debunked one of his works salvation posts fair and square, and instead of responding he just blocked me so I can't keep exposing his pharisaic ideas.
